main event: Three military witnesses observed a stationary object changing colors at Shemya AFS, Alaska on October 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed colors every 2 seconds from red to green to white., The object appeared variable in shape, being spherical and oblong at times., Observers reported the object moving in a square pattern, going up, down, and hovering., A Navy aircraft was alerted but found nothing unusual in the area., The sighting lasted for 30 minutes and was lost to sight due to clouds.
sighted object: a color-changing object in the sky
